content:
That's a great plan! Logging your workouts and using a habit tracker will help you stay accountable and motivated. Setting specific goals and rewarding yourself when you reach them will give you a sense of accomplishment and drive. Mixing up your workouts will prevent boredom and prevent plateaus. And, reminding yourself of your "why" will help you stay focused and committed to your goals.

It's awesome that you're taking steps to improve your cardiovascular endurance and confidence in kickboxing classes. Remember to be patient and kind to yourself throughout your journey. Consistency and progress may not always be linear, but with persistence and dedication, you'll get there!

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'll be here to support you on your fitness journey.

Keep crushing your workouts and remember to celebrate your small wins along the way!
